Text:
Thank you so much for continuing to make this available!
Otherwise, down here in NZ there is no access to this n I love watching Ray Mears, Les Stroud n Bear Grylls as Ive been instructing in bush craft for years now, formerly in Canada n the u.s.. Doing it myself since my mid teens.
Thanks mate!!!!
